name: Save The Villy
description: Save The Villy - A game about a simple forester who devoted his entire life to his work. Years passed, but he was still faithful to his work, but at one point the life of the forest was in danger..
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Intel celeron Graphics: GeForce GTX 480 Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 Processor: Intel core DUO Graphics: Radeon R7 265 Storage: 100 MB available space
